snippet: Uncertainties aside, there is a lot to like in Mayor Bill de Blasio’s budget proposal.
abstract: Editorial cautiously applauds first executive budget submitted by New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio; holds that while plan is marred by some uncertainties, it contains many beneficial items; notes that by working to eliminate excessive haggling over budget, de Blasio has made room for grown-up negotiation on which good budgets can be built.
lead_paragraph: Uncertainties aside, there is a lot to like in Mayor Bill de Blasio’s budget proposal.
